channel.title: SetupDiag on A Square Dozen
channel.description: Recent content in SetupDiag on A Square Dozen

item.title: Analyze SetupDiag errors for Feature Updates in ConfigMgr 2008 Technical Preview
item.description: As soon as I read the release notes for ConfigMgr 2008 Technical Preview I knew I would be doing some digging. This release introduced the first iteration of a feature that will hopefully help make Windows 10 Feature Update servicing a little easier to manage. Listed as Analyze SetupDiag errors for feature updates this feature has been added to the Windows 10 Servicing dashboard. When I initially read the release notes and looked at the included graph, I was disappointed.
